5ef0846c3fb43e0db90389298f0219a2.name: Update 15.7.2 + 15.7.2.1
5ef0846c3fb43e0db90389298f0219a2.changes: Removed the Anemic Agility Mod from the Grineer Ballista's drop table. This was only ever intended to drop in Orokin Derelict Vaults.

5ef0846c3fb43e0db90389298f0219a2.name: Warframe: Archwing
5ef0846c3fb43e0db90389298f0219a2.changes: Anemic Agility: Pistol: Increased fire rate, but decreased damage.

9b20856ece70dbe1a14326d499871a93.name: Hotfix 15.5.8
9b20856ece70dbe1a14326d499871a93.changes: Fixed issue with Gammacor caused by using the Barrel Diffusion, Lethal Torrent and Seeker Mods all at once.

60cae08e98516b17ce8562e7b0349097.name: Recurring Dreams + Hotfix 1
60cae08e98516b17ce8562e7b0349097.additions: Meteor Crash, Nebula Bore, and Astral Slash have been added to the Codex.

60cae08e98516b17ce8562e7b0349097.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
60cae08e98516b17ce8562e7b0349097.fixes: Fixed Archwing Impact, Slash, and Puncture Mods giving incorrect bonuses to stats. They were giving flat bonus rather than percentages as intended by the precedent set by all other physical damage mods  (Comet Blast, Quasar Drill, Zodiac Shred, Meteor Crash, Nebula Bore, and Astral Slash are all +90%).

98d3f7184a81a48779dc0c33a196d9b6.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.6.0 + Hotfix 22.6.0.1
98d3f7184a81a48779dc0c33a196d9b6.fixes: Fixed Concealed Explosives mod description showing Pistol instead of Thrown.

98d3f7184a81a48779dc0c33a196d9b6.name: Update 18.9.0
98d3f7184a81a48779dc0c33a196d9b6.fixes: •    Fixed overlapping explosive sounds on the Concealed Explosives mod.

98d3f7184a81a48779dc0c33a196d9b6.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
98d3f7184a81a48779dc0c33a196d9b6.fixes: Fixed explosions from the Concealed Explosives Mod damaging Corpus Nullifiers through their bubbles.

98d3f7184a81a48779dc0c33a196d9b6.name: Update 17.3.0
98d3f7184a81a48779dc0c33a196d9b6.changes: Mirage’s clones produced from Hall of Mirrors will now display a smaller explosion when using the Concealed Explosives Mod to help improve performance.

98d3f7184a81a48779dc0c33a196d9b6.name: Hotfix 17.0.3
98d3f7184a81a48779dc0c33a196d9b6.changes:
Altered the visual effect of explosions that come from the Concealed Explosives Mod.
Tweaked the audio FX of explosions triggered by the Concealed Explosives Mod.

7c6f56f466ef383f7ee49639bda97329.name: Warframe: Archwing
7c6f56f466ef383f7ee49639bda97329.changes: Creeping Bullseye: Pistol: Increased crit chance, but decreased fire rate.

76ebcc6b96ea37c5440beb62780e1e13.name: Update 15.13
76ebcc6b96ea37c5440beb62780e1e13.changes: Updated the Deep Freeze Mod to give up to 90% Freeze damage to match other elemental Mods.

9547d53af101472c578ce5149ccdd099.name: Hotfix 16.1.3
9547d53af101472c578ce5149ccdd099.fixes: Fixed the Mod description of the Entropy Spike Mod to clarify its intended purpose.

9547d53af101472c578ce5149ccdd099.name: Warframe: Archwing
9547d53af101472c578ce5149ccdd099.changes: Bolto: Entropy Spike: adds 0.1% projectile explosion chance

64fe3021afaeac722d204edce16db03d.name: Update 11.3.0

eebd8981a75cfaca1825aa0beaca2e88.fixes: Fixed Hornet Strike not affecting DOT from the Acrid

40ff66ab5bbc1740c9964aa6872380cc.name: Mask of the Revenant: Update 23.8.0 + 23.8.0.1 + 23.8.0.2
40ff66ab5bbc1740c9964aa6872380cc.changes: Removed ability to unintentionally equip Hydraulic Crosshairs and Sharpened Bullets on Mesa’s Regulators. Although the buff appeared to trigger, it never actually applied due to the "on aim" criteria not being fulfilled (unless you had a very specific loadout with the Mesa Waltz Augment equipped).

40ff66ab5bbc1740c9964aa6872380cc.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.8.1
40ff66ab5bbc1740c9964aa6872380cc.fixes: Fixed Argon Scope, Hydraulic Crosshairs and Repeater Clip not using proper HUD buff icon.

9cc4801b36f0f05bdf77d780d937f72c.name: Hotfix 19.0.3
9cc4801b36f0f05bdf77d780d937f72c.changes: Fixed missing link to Tethra's Doom mods in the codex (was preventing Jolt and Voltaic Strike from showing up in the codex).

3fca00f3bc28cd4deb9c71ac0294e083.name: Update 15.13
3fca00f3bc28cd4deb9c71ac0294e083.fixes: Fixed the Buzlok and Twin Gremlin being unable to equip Terminal Velocity or the Lethal Momentum Mods.

3fca00f3bc28cd4deb9c71ac0294e083.name: Warframe: Archwing
3fca00f3bc28cd4deb9c71ac0294e083.changes: Lethal Momentum: Pistol: Weapon Projectile Speed.

6b606e9a3c81404cdcc7474ae91be37e.name: Hotfix 15.5.8
6b606e9a3c81404cdcc7474ae91be37e.changes: Fixed issue with Gammacor caused by using the Barrel Diffusion, Lethal Torrent and Seeker Mods all at once.

6b606e9a3c81404cdcc7474ae91be37e.name: Update 9.7
6b606e9a3c81404cdcc7474ae91be37e.changes: Mod Rewards from “Arid Fear” event (Shred, Vigor, Lethal Torrent) now available in Nightmare Mode

a81c19f287ff1ac0ba2cd2c73786b19a.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
a81c19f287ff1ac0ba2cd2c73786b19a.fixes: Fixed Magnum Force equipped on Castanas modded for multishot resulting in pin-point accuracy.

a81c19f287ff1ac0ba2cd2c73786b19a.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.3.1
a81c19f287ff1ac0ba2cd2c73786b19a.fixes: Fixed the Magnum Force Mod having 2 Accuracy stats in the description.

a81c19f287ff1ac0ba2cd2c73786b19a.name: Update 10.5.0: The Gradivus Dilemma
a81c19f287ff1ac0ba2cd2c73786b19a.changes:
Corrupted “Magnum Force” mod now works with Acrid.
Corrupted Mod “Magnum Force” changed from Damage/Recoil to Damage/Accuracy trade-off.

aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.2
aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.fixes: Fixed Maim not damaging enemies if there are many enemies in its radius.

aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #3
aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.changes:
Moved Nyx’ Absorb damage counter up to the buff notification area (like Equinox' Maim damage counter).
Made Equinox’ Maim damage counter show up immediately (as zero) so that you can tell you've cast it even when there are no enemies in range.

aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #2
aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.changes: Compacted large numbers for some ability notifications on the HUD (eg: Equinox’s Maim).

aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.name: Update: Lunaro
aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.fixes: •    Fixed the Maiming Strike Mod not applying Critical Damage if your slide was cancelled right before you attacked the enemy.

aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.name: Update 18.13.0: TennoGen, Passives, & Reworks
aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.fixes: •    Fixed not seeing squadmates using certain Warframe abilities (Sound Quake, Spectral Scream, Elemental Ward, Undertow, Absorb, Mend & Maim, and Sandstorm) when joining a mission in progress.

aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.changes: Lowered the damage of Equinox’s Maim Ability in Conclave.

aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.fixes: Fixed Equinox’s Mend & Maim visual FX not properly displaying if the player is stealthed while the Ability is active.

aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.fixes: Fixed Equinox’s Maim doing damage to the player when deactivated on a Rampart.

aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.name: Update 14.7.0: Operation Gate Crash!
aa9aeac1f02899541217e029067fb97c.fixes: 10 Exposure points: Set of 4 Mods – Buzz Kill, Fanged Fusillade, Sweeping Serration and Maim

4adb58ebd9099200cbe2b4d54f2782b6.name: Warframe: Archwing
4adb58ebd9099200cbe2b4d54f2782b6.changes: Perpetual Agony: Pistol: Weapon Proc Time.

94c8ee6ad8229073d8b55c2e1adec21d.name: Hotfix 16.10.1
94c8ee6ad8229073d8b55c2e1adec21d.fixes: Fixed incorrect stats showing on the Primed Pistol Gambit Mod in the Arsenal

82d55968da3fbf5d6d573cae21edeb1c.name: Hotfix 16.10.1
82d55968da3fbf5d6d573cae21edeb1c.fixes: Fixed incorrect stats showing on the Primed Pistol Gambit Mod in the Arsenal

37b0972587fd4a43695af1df74754c45.name: Fortuna: Update 24.0
37b0972587fd4a43695af1df74754c45.fixes: Fixed Primed Quickdraw not appearing in the Codex when owned.

18bf1a6447a9c967952de89e9b1e4237.name: Fortuna: Update 24.0
18bf1a6447a9c967952de89e9b1e4237.fixes: Fixed Primed Quickdraw not appearing in the Codex when owned.

8b8f0b1c20c51c64979995f8f21911dc.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.10
8b8f0b1c20c51c64979995f8f21911dc.fixes: Fixed inability to equip Ruinous Extension on the Ocucor.

8b8f0b1c20c51c64979995f8f21911dc.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.3.5
8b8f0b1c20c51c64979995f8f21911dc.fixes: Fixed being able to equip the Ruinous Extension Mod on the Arca Scisco.

8b8f0b1c20c51c64979995f8f21911dc.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.4.0
8b8f0b1c20c51c64979995f8f21911dc.fixes: Fixed not being able to equip Ruinous Extension on the Cycron.

8b8f0b1c20c51c64979995f8f21911dc.name: Update 15.7.0 Nova Prime
8b8f0b1c20c51c64979995f8f21911dc.fixes: Fixed the Ruinous Extension Mod not being compatible with the Gammacor and Synoid Gammacor.

8b8f0b1c20c51c64979995f8f21911dc.name: Warframe: Archwing
8b8f0b1c20c51c64979995f8f21911dc.changes: Ruinous Extension: Pistol: Extend range on beam weapons.

dc184ed059a39ef2b4adabcd2e7e1f6a.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
dc184ed059a39ef2b4adabcd2e7e1f6a.fixes: Fixed misaligned textures on the Grineer Scorch helmet.

dc184ed059a39ef2b4adabcd2e7e1f6a.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
dc184ed059a39ef2b4adabcd2e7e1f6a.fixes:
Fixed issue where players could get hit and take fire Proc damage when outside FX range of Scorch's Ignis.
Fixed Hyekka Master and Scorch’s firing their Ignis’ too high.

dc184ed059a39ef2b4adabcd2e7e1f6a.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
dc184ed059a39ef2b4adabcd2e7e1f6a.fixes: Fixed Grineer Napalm and Scorch’s targeting/shooting you through walls.

dc184ed059a39ef2b4adabcd2e7e1f6a.name: Hotfix 16.11.5
dc184ed059a39ef2b4adabcd2e7e1f6a.fixes: Fixed an issue with Chroma’s Elemental Ward causing Grineer Scorch to reflect the AoE slow + Damage aura when augmented as Ice.

dc184ed059a39ef2b4adabcd2e7e1f6a.name: Hotfix 15.6.2
dc184ed059a39ef2b4adabcd2e7e1f6a.fixes: Fixed only Nullifier Crewman and Scorching Osprey spawning after the portal is destroyed in Orokin Sabotage.

4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.1.2 + 24.1.2.1
4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.fixes:
Fixed Pax Seeker activating on Warframe Exalted Ability Weapons (i.e. Titania Razorwing, Mesa Regulators).
Fixed Pax Seeker projectiles and Phantasma’s Alt Fire ignoring Nullifier bubbles.

4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.1.1 + 24.1.1.1
4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.fixes: Fixed Pax Seeker projectiles not showing up for Clients.

4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.4.0
4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.changes: To fix Tusk Seeker Drones lingering indefinitely and continuously calling in Grineer Reinforcements (even after you’ve ran far away), the Alarm Drone now destroys itself when you are 100 meters away.

4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.name: Update 18.13.0: TennoGen, Passives, & Reworks
4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.fixes: •    Fixed the Seeker pistol Mod displaying the wrong value as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/650694-seeker-states-35-punch-through/

4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.name: Update 15.6.0
4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.changes: Saryn’s Molt now removes Brood Mother Maggots, Nanite Swarms, Seeker Latchers and Leeches.

4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.name: Hotfix 15.5.8
4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.changes: Fixed issue with Gammacor caused by using the Barrel Diffusion, Lethal Torrent and Seeker Mods all at once.

4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.name: Hotfix 9.3
4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.fixes: Fixed Bastille not affecting Grineer Seekers and Snipers, fixed damage not registering against Crewman affected by Bastille

4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.name: Hotfix 9.2.0
4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.fixes: Fixed the Seeker and Seeking Force mods so that their puncture amount increases with each level, instead of every other level.

4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.name: Update 7.11.0: Vauban!
4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.fixes: Seekers now have limit to number of active Latchers they can deploy.

4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.name: Update 7.7.3: Level Expansions And New Weapons!
4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.fixes: New Grineer helmets for Trooper, Seeker and Commander

4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.name: Update 6.3 - "make Love, Not War(Frame)"
4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.additions: New enemy types: The Grineer Seeker with a devastating new attack.

4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.name: Update 5.4 - "Hammer Time" (Preview)
4b310b3b94762b454856c72bccffd6ba.fixes: 639 French updates from ap0k41yp5, Flamby, Jupiter87a, Kolo, Ln_Fridfromedisailleur and RageSeeker.

38f59739b40d4e25c5731f3ca45f5a33.name: Mask of the Revenant: Update 23.8.0 + 23.8.0.1 + 23.8.0.2
38f59739b40d4e25c5731f3ca45f5a33.changes: Removed ability to unintentionally equip Hydraulic Crosshairs and Sharpened Bullets on Mesa’s Regulators. Although the buff appeared to trigger, it never actually applied due to the "on aim" criteria not being fulfilled (unless you had a very specific loadout with the Mesa Waltz Augment equipped).

e07affbfc74a18eb5265c16a4265e1ba.name: Update 16.7
e07affbfc74a18eb5265c16a4265e1ba.changes: The following mods have been disabled in PvP: Magazine Warp, Slip Magazine, Burdened Magazine, Stabilizer, Steady Hands, Fast Hands, Quick Draw, Tactical Pump and Terminal Velocity. They have been replaced with PvP specific versions that have been added to the Mission Rewards of all PvP game types.

22c45fa557cc6d0e0eda3b44b254cc72.name: Update 16.7
22c45fa557cc6d0e0eda3b44b254cc72.changes: The following mods have been disabled in PvP: Magazine Warp, Slip Magazine, Burdened Magazine, Stabilizer, Steady Hands, Fast Hands, Quick Draw, Tactical Pump and Terminal Velocity. They have been replaced with PvP specific versions that have been added to the Mission Rewards of all PvP game types.

4e3db1eac407f20d60621effbd80220f.name: Warframe: Archwing
4e3db1eac407f20d60621effbd80220f.changes: Viper: Stinging Truth: Adds 10 magazine capacity

3164ae735fa9be61eede61d46cb1607a.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.2
3164ae735fa9be61eede61d46cb1607a.fixes: Fixed a seam/texture issue on the Vauban Suppressor Skin.

3164ae735fa9be61eede61d46cb1607a.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
3164ae735fa9be61eede61d46cb1607a.changes: Hush and Suppress mods are no longer usable in PvP.

3164ae735fa9be61eede61d46cb1607a.name: Update 10.2.0
3164ae735fa9be61eede61d46cb1607a.fixes:
Hush and Suppress mods now lower the sound of weapons when equipped.
Fixed Suppress/Hush mod to actually reduce sound effect volume of the weapon it’s attached to.

bb3fec410a1b5974f80d4ebf72b3237a.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
bb3fec410a1b5974f80d4ebf72b3237a.fixes: Fixed the 'Synth Charge' Mod being erroneously equippable on some Exalted Weapons.

bb3fec410a1b5974f80d4ebf72b3237a.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.1
bb3fec410a1b5974f80d4ebf72b3237a.changes: Synth Charge Mod no longer applies to Pistols with < 5 Ammo Magazines (Knell, etc). Mod description has been updated to reflect the ‘Requires Magazine 5 or higher’ restriction.

18862d6cfb7400f0485a9b78641f2021.name: Warframe: Archwing
18862d6cfb7400f0485a9b78641f2021.changes: Acrid: Toxic Sequence: adds 50% status duration.

b6e93084a30aeab8640fdb2f4f5accdf.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.2.0 + 21.2.0.1
b6e93084a30aeab8640fdb2f4f5accdf.fixes: Fixed Trick Mag applying to your Primary weapon when equipped on the Cycron.

b6e93084a30aeab8640fdb2f4f5accdf.name: Hotfix 14.0.5
b6e93084a30aeab8640fdb2f4f5accdf.fixes: Fixed an issue where weapons that had a max ammo override would not be affected by ammo max mods, like the AkZani not being affected by Trick Mag.
